transcript.text: Congratulations, you have successfully passed the final Knowledge Check.

instructionText.text: Click on Home to return to the Main menu. From here, you can access your certificate of course completion.

feedbackPass.text: With a score of ##%, you have passed the Knowledge Check for the: Applying the Ethics Code: Doing Business with Integrity course.

feedbackFail.text: With a score of ##%, you have not passed the course.
You need to score #% or more to pass. Please revisit the program and then try this Knowledge Check again.
